name: Connoils By Kraft - Bulk Organic Plant Sterol Oil & Powder
description: Connoils By Kraft is a leading international supplement manufacturer offering bulk organic plant sterol oil and oil powder. These phytosterols serve as natural cholesterol alternatives for barrier repair formulations, providing barrier support and anti-inflammatory benefits. Available in bulk with organic options.
products: Bulk Organic Plant Sterol Oil Powder
notes: Leading international supplement manufacturer with bulk capabilities. Organic options available for natural/organic formulations. Both oil and powder forms provide formulation flexibility. Bulk focus suitable for large-scale manufacturers.
